views.templates

Class BoardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • views.templates.BoardView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class BoardView
extends javafx.scene.Parent
    JavaFX view of a Board.

        Shows a possible Position for a Domino according to the other ones on the Board.
        Parameters:

        position2 - Position of the second LandPortion of the Domino.
